title: 06/23/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/23/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin tells you why he was so impressed with the Suns and the Clippers based on what he saw in game 2 of the Western Conference Finals. He explains why he hates how long video reviews take in NBA games but unfortunately they are necessary. He also believes Russell Wilson and the Seahawks are turning into Big Ben and the Steelers with one major difference. Plus, he talks to NBA veteran Cuttino Mobley to find out if the Suns have what it takes to win the title this year.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
